title: Raring to Go!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Ai wants to see your full-blown smile, Makki!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>What are you saying all of the sudden….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Well, Ai just thought that Ai would like to see your full-blown smile, Makki. Show me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Even if you say that, it’s not like I can just smile like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeh, Ai can do it though. Look look-! *Smile*-!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>….Heh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, you smiled a little! Then, Ai will give a barrage of 100 puns starting now-! “I’m strengthening the cores of my course”, “After eating the cookies my eyes went kooky”, “This amount of pudding is off-pudding”, “Let’s workout! Hmm, would it work out though~”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Wait wait wait. Puns don’t really make me laugh, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eeh, is that so? Then, Ai will tickle you! Oryaa---!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Kyaah--! W-, Wai-, kyahahahaha!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
